questions.question: A man of industrious nature is sure to succeed.
questions.description: The given sentence has only one finite verb and hence it is a simple sentence.

questions.question: He that climbs too high is sure to fall.
questions.description: The given sentence has one main clause and a subordinate adjective clause. Hence it is a complex sentence.

questions.description: The given sentence has one main clause and a subordinate adjective clause. Hence it is a complex sentence.
